thread.title: Win a solo reset at Logan Brae Orchard Copy
thread.title_full: Win a solo reset at Logan Brae Orchard Copy

author: Jaime Carmody
title: Win a solo reset at Logan Brae Orchard Copy
text:
To celebrate the season of slowing down, Logan Brae Orchard is inviting RUSSH readers to experience a solo reset, a peaceful escape to recharge in nature. Guests booking a solo stay at The Machinery Shed will receive 30% off plus a pamper pack to help you soak up the calm before facing the world again. Simply enter ‘SOLO’ when booking directly to redeem your offer. This is more than a getaway — it’s an invitation to slow down, recharge, and reconnect with nature. Whether you’re seeking solitude, inspiration, or just a moment of magic, The Machinery Shed offers a rare escape from everyday life.
One-person bookings only. Flexible dates apply. Direct bookings only.
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by The Aje Edits (@the.aje.edits)
About Logan Brae Orchard:
Tucked away within a 100-year-old apple orchard on the edge of the Kanimbla escarpments, The Machinery Shed is a private retreat where rustic charm meets modern luxury. Once part of a working farm, the space has been transformed into a serene haven filled with warmth and character, a place to slow down and reconnect. Inside, an open-plan living area glows beneath a canopy of fairy lights, with a king-size bed, luxurious bathroom, and fully equipped kitchen designed for comfort and calm. Step outside to take in sweeping orchard views, gather by the firepit under the stars, or soak in the iconic treetop bath. An adults-only escape, The Machinery Shed is perfect for couples, solo travellers, or creatives seeking stillness and inspiration among the beauty of the Blue Mountains.
Here’s how to win:
Imagine waking up to crisp orchard air, exploring hidden corners of the Blue Mountains, and sipping a morning coffee while surrounded by endless green — all yours to experience if you win!
Simply enter the competition form below to win:
Email First Name Last Name Post Code Subscribe
Flexible dates apply, and the competition is open to all RUSSH readers. One winner will receive a full stay at The Machinery Shed, giving you the perfect reason to press pause and immerse yourself in this tranquil orchard retreat. Competition closes on the 11th December, 2025. Terms and conditions apply.
Image: Logan Brae Orchard
Want more competitions and giveaways? Head to our Win page to see everything we’re offering at the moment, or follow us on socials to stay up to date on all things RUSSH .
Stay inspired, follow us.
